name: SCUMPIGحثالة الخنزير
description:
SCUMPIG is a simple 3D move and dodge game made using the Godot engine.

Made following this tutorial series by BornCG: 

This marks the first game I have created on my gamedev learning journey. Enjoy.

7 levels, see if you can get your total time below 185 seconds!

game of the year inbound. get in on this now so you can gatekeep the cult following community that forms around this in 5-10 years 

cowabunga!
